response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am confident it will bring significant benefits and opportunities to your endeavors. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $900,000. This is an exclusive chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate, ensuring you maximize its potential impact on your business or personal goals. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 900000}
